df-rlreg
blocks.content: Define the set of _left-regular elements_ in a ring as those elements which are not left zero divisors, meaning that multiplying a nonzero element on the left by a left-regular element gives a nonzero product. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: df-domn
blocks.content: A _domain_ is a nonzero ring in which there are no nontrivial zero divisors. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-domn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cdomn, crab(s0, cnzr, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wi(wceq(co(cv(s3), cfv(cmulr, cv(s0)), cv(s4)), cv(s2)), wo(wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s4), cv(s2))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-domn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ Domn = { s0 ‚àà NzRing |[(Base ` s0)/ s1][(0 ` s0)/ s2]‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1,((s3[(√ó ` s0)]s4)= s2 ‚Üí(s3 = s2 ‚à® s4 = s2))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-idom
blocks.content: An _integral domain_ is a commutative domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: df-pid
blocks.content: A _principal ideal domain_ is an integral domain satisfying the left principal ideal property. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: rrgval
blocks.content: Value of the set or left-regular elements in a ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrgval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(crlreg, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmulr, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3), wceq(cv(s1), c3))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  eqtri(c0, crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))), cfv(crlreg, c4))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(crlreg, c4), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3), wceq(cv(s1), c3))))), wcel(c4, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c4, universe, crlreg, crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))), crab(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)))))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3), wceq(cv(s1), c3))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)))), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, cbs)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3), wceq(cv(s1), c3))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cmulr, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, cmulr)
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c0g, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, c0g)
  df-rlreg(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3), wceq(cv(s1), c3))))

thm rrgval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 = { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3))}
  ‚ä£ c0 =(RLReg ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(√ó ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(c0 = { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3))}, d(s1, c1))
  eqtri(c0, { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3))}, (RLReg ` c4))
  pm2.61i((RLReg ` c4)= { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3))}, c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c4, universe, crlreg, { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3))}, { s0 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),((s0[(√ó ` hs0)]s1)=(0 ` hs0)‚Üí s1 =(0 ` hs0)))})
  rabeqbidv(s0, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c4, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),((s0[(√ó ` hs0)]s1)=(0 ` hs0)‚Üí s1 =(0 ` hs0))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3)))
  raleqbidv(s1, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c4, ((s0[(√ó ` hs0)]s1)=(0 ` hs0)‚Üí s1 =(0 ` hs0)), ((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c4), hs0 = c4)
  fveq2(hs0, c4, cbs)
  imbi12d(hs0 = c4, (s0[(√ó ` hs0)]s1)=(0 ` hs0), s1 =(0 ` hs0), (s0[c2]s1)= c3, s1 = c3)
  eqeq12d((s0[(√ó ` hs0)]s1), (0 ` hs0), (s0[c2]s1), c3, hs0 = c4)
  oveqd(s0, (√ó ` hs0), s1, c2, hs0 = c4)
  syl6eqr((√ó ` hs0), c2, (√ó ` c4), hs0 = c4)
  fveq2(hs0, c4, cmulr)
  eqeq2d(s1, (0 ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c4)
  syl6eqr((0 ` hs0), c3, (0 ` c4), hs0 = c4)
  fveq2(hs0, c4, c0g)
  df-rlreg(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(s0, c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3)))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c4)
  eqtr4d((RLReg ` c4), { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3))}, emptycls, ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c4, crlreg)
  syl6eq({ s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3))}, emptycls, { s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3))}, ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  rabeqdv(s0, c1, emptycls, ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (Base ` c4), ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c4, cbs)
  rab0(s0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= c3 ‚Üí s1 = c3))})
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, hs0)

blocks.name: isrrg
blocks.content: Membership in the set of left-regular elements. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isrrg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(crlreg, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, wral(s0, c2, wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c4))), wral(s0, c2, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0)), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c4))))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0)), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0)), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), c4))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0)), c4, co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c3, cv(s0))
  rrgval(hs0, s0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c2, wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c4))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isrrg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((c0[c3]s0)= c4 ‚Üí s0 = c4))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(RLReg ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(√ó ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((c0[c3]s0)= c4 ‚Üí s0 = c4)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c3]s0)= c4 ‚Üí s0 = c4)))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, hs0 = c0, ((hs0[c3]s0)= c4 ‚Üí s0 = c4), ((c0[c3]s0)= c4 ‚Üí s0 = c4))
  imbi1d(hs0 = c0, (hs0[c3]s0)= c4, s0 = c4, (c0[c3]s0)= c4)
  eqeq1d((hs0[c3]s0), c4, (c0[c3]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, c3, s0)
  rrgval(hs0, s0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((c0[c3]s0)= c4 ‚Üí s0 = c4)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)

blocks.name: rrgeq0i
blocks.content: Property of a left-regular element. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrgeq0i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wceq(c2, c5)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(crlreg, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmulr, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c6))
} = {
  mpan9(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wi(wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wceq(c2, c5)), wral(hs0, c3, wi(wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(hs0)), c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c3, wi(wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(hs0)), c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))), wcel(c0, c3))
  isrrg(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  rspcv(hs0, c2, c3, wi(wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(hs0)), c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)), wi(wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wceq(c2, c5)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(hs0)), c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c5), wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wceq(c2, c5))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c4, cv(hs0)), c5, co(c0, c4, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, c4)
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wceq(c2, c5)))
}

thm rrgeq0i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí((c0[c4]c2)= c5 ‚Üí c2 = c5))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(RLReg ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(√ó ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(0 ` c6)
} = {
  mpan9(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, ((c0[c4]c2)= c5 ‚Üí c2 = c5), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c3,((c0[c4]hs0)= c5 ‚Üí hs0 = c5)))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c3,((c0[c4]hs0)= c5 ‚Üí hs0 = c5)), c0 ‚àà c3)
  isrrg(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  rspcv(hs0, c2, c3, ((c0[c4]hs0)= c5 ‚Üí hs0 = c5), ((c0[c4]c2)= c5 ‚Üí c2 = c5))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c2, (c0[c4]hs0)= c5, hs0 = c5, (c0[c4]c2)= c5, c2 = c5)
  eqeq1d((c0[c4]hs0), c5, (c0[c4]c2), hs0 = c2)
  oveq2(hs0, c2, c0, c4)
  eqeq1(hs0, c2, c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0[c4]c2)= c5 ‚Üí c2 = c5))
}

blocks.name: rrgeq0
blocks.content: Left-multiplication by a left regular element does not change zeroness. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrgeq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wb(wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), c6), wceq(c3, c6)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(crlreg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
